mapper.select: select count(dno) as count from mou_diary
mapper.insert: insert into mou_diary(dno, id, content, weather, emotion, praise, thanks) values(mou_diary_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{content}, #{weather}, #{emotion}, #{praise}, #{thanks})
mapper.update: update mou_diary set content=#{content}, praise=#{praise}, thanks=#{thanks} where dno=#{dno}
mapper.select: select rownum, dno, id, weather, emotion, praise, thanks, writedate from (select /*+index_desc(mou_diary pk_diary)*/ rownum as rn, dno, id, weather, emotion, praise, thanks, writedate from mou_diary where rownum <= 5) where rn > 0
